General.Name: Grupo Elektra S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Elektra, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a financial services and specialty trading company in Latin America. The company's Commercial Division offers electronics, appliances, household appliances, furniture, motorcycles, tires, batteries, bicycles, cell phones, computers, toys, electronic money transfers, extended warranties, and airtime, and others. Its Financial Division provides consumer credit, personal loans, pledge loans, deposits, credit cards, and other financing services; accident, health, and life insurance products; and brokerage services. The company also offers short-term non-bank loans. Grupo Elektra, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Av. Ferrocarril de Río Frío N° 419-CJ, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 09010
